name: Data Members naming convention - case control
description:
This rule searches for C++ class data members that do not respect naming conventions. 

Note: Data Member names should start with a lowercase character and symbols such as '_' are also to be avoided. Const Data Members are not taken into account.
output:
Associated to each C++ class data member with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- data member name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
total: Number of C++ class data members
